remarks: Derive the axioms for a normed group from the axioms for a metric space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
statement:
tngngp.t $e |- T = ( G toNrmGrp N ) $.
tngngp.x $e |- X = ( Base ` G ) $.
tngngp.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` G ) $.
tngngp.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
tngngpd.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) $.
tngngpd.2 $e |- ( ph -> N : X --> RR ) $.
tngngpd.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> ( ( N ` x ) = 0 <-> x = .0. ) ) $.
tngngpd.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. X /\ y e. X ) ) -> ( N ` ( x .- y ) ) <_ ( ( N ` x ) + ( N ` y ) ) ) $.
tngngpd $p |- ( ph -> T e. NrmGrp ) $.
$d .- x y $.
$d .0. x y $.
$d N x y $.
$d T x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d ph x y $.
